title: Permissions
description: This plugin comes with a few permissions
Some of which are always applicable, but others only come with AnimatedMenu Plus
There are also custom permissions you can set in click handlers for example. These are not discussed here however

values.name: animatedmenu.command.<arg>
description: Tab complete will also only show the subcommands you have permission to see

values.name: animatedmenu.openWithItem
values.description: Be able to open menus using an item

values.name: animatedmenu.seeUpdate
values.description: Receive a message when you join and there is an update available

values.name: animatedmenu.polls.max.<amount>
description: Specifies the max amount of polls a player can create
You can use @default@ to use the default value as specified in config.yml
A value of -1 indicates that there is no limit (so 0 means no polls)

values.name: animatedmenu.polls.closeOther
description: Be able to close a poll that was created by another player
Closed polls can not be voted at anymore, but you can still view the results

values.name: animatedmenu.polls.removeOther
values.description: Be able to remove a poll that was created by another player
